15910.「……やれやれ。\n どうあっても 最後まで見届けねば\n 気が済まぬようじゃな:
Oh dear. It seems you have to see things
through to the end no matter what.

15911.「こ これは エイドスさま。\n 今回は どうなさったのです？:
Well, well, well, Mr. Eidos. What did you do
this time?

15912.「そろそろ オーレンが ベコン渓谷に\n 戻る頃合いじゃろうと思ってな……。:
I thought it was about time for Oren to return
to Becon Valley.

15913.「おおかた また お前さんたちが\n 余計なことを 考えているだろうと\n こう:
Mostly, I came here because I thought you
would be thinking about something else.

15914.「いや そのう……ハッハッハッ。\n さすがは エイドスさま。ご明察ですなぁ。:
No, I mean...hahaha. As expected of Mr. Eidos.
You have a good grasp of things, don't you?

15915.「……ふん。止めたところで 無駄なのは\n よ～く わかっておるわい。:
...Hmm. I know that there is no point in
trying to stop them.

15916.「今回は わしも 同行させてもらおう。\n お前さんが 余計な手出しをせんように:
This time, I will accompany you. I'll keep an
eye on you to make sure you don't do anything
unnecessary.

15917.「フフン。止めても 無駄じゃぞ。\n では わしは 先に行っておるからな。\n:
Hmph. There's no point in stopping. I'll go on
ahead. Don't keep me waiting too long!

15918.「遅いぞ <cs_pchero>。\n ほれっ！ あれを見てみい。:
You're late, <cs_pchero>. Here! Look at
that.

15919.「ずいぶん長い間 待たせてしまったな……。: I've kept you waiting a long time...

15920.「このグロリスのしずくを かければ\n 魔瘴に侵された お前たちを \n 救って:
This Droplet of Gloris should be able to save
you from the demon miasma that has invaded
your lives.

15921.オーレンは グロリスのしずくを\nガイコツたちに 振りまいた。:
Oren sprinkled Droplets of Gloris on the
Geikots.

15923.「バ バカな……。\n グロリスのしずくを 浴びせれば\n すべて うまくいくは:
Bah, no way... a dash of Droplet of Gloris
should make everything all right...

15924.「魔瘴に侵された亡者が しずくを浴びれば\n 消え去るのは 道理じゃな。:
It stands to reason that a demon miasma-
infested wraith would vanish in a drop of
water.

15925.「……今こそ すべてを語ろう。\n 妖剣士オーレンが生まれた そのわけを。:
Now is the time to tell the whole story. The
reason why Swordmaster Oren was born.

15926.「グロリスのしずくを手に入れた オーレンは\n 血と汗に まみれながらも 部下た:
Droplet of Gloris received, Oren, covered in blood and sweat, made it to the depths of Becon Valley, where his men were waiting for
him.

15927.「オーレンが そこで見たものは……\n すでに 絶命し 魔瘴に侵されきって \n:
What Oren saw there... were the living corpses
of his men, already extinct and infected by
demon miasma.

15928.「そして その凶刃は オーレンに向けられた。\n 肉体的にも 精神的にも 疲れき:
And the blade was pointed at Oren. What in the
world could a physically and mentally
exhausted Oren do?

15929.「全身を 部下たちの剣で 斬り刻まれながら\n オーレンは 絶叫したという……。:
Oren screamed as his entire body was sliced
and diced by the swords of his men...

15932.「こうして 妖剣士オーレンは 誕生した。\n わしが それらの出来事を知ったのは:
Thus was born Swordmaster Oren. I did not
learn of these events until after it was all
over...

15933.「わしに 迷惑が かからぬよう\n オーレンは 追われる身となったときから\n:
Oren cut off all communication with me when he
became a wanted man, so as not to cause me any
trouble.

15934.「……オォオオォオオオォォ！！\n なぜだ？ なぜ こうなった！？\n 私は な:
...ohohohohohohohoh! How did this happen? How
did this happen? Why did I come all this
way...

15935.「生前の記憶に囚われた オーレンが\n 雲上湖に 向かったときから \n この結:
I knew this was coming from the moment Oren,
haunted by memories of his life, headed to Sky
Lake.

15936.「わかっていながら わしには\n あやつを止めることが できんかった。: I knew it, but I couldn't stop him.

15939.「戻ってきたか <cs_pchero>。\n ……もはや 今のオーレンには\n:
You're back <cs_pchero>. ...I guess nothing
I say makes sense to Oren now.

15940.「こうなることを 予想はしていたが……。\n すまんな <cs_pchero>。:
I knew this was coming, but I'm sorry
<cs_pchero>. You stop Oren.

15941.「……オォオオォオオオォォ！！\n なぜだ？ なぜ こうなった！？\n 私は な:
...ohohohohohohohoh! How did this happen? How
did this happen? Why did I come all this
way...

15944.「すべて 終わったのじゃよ。\n もう 眠りにつくがよい オーレンよ。: It's all over. Now go to sleep, Oren.

15946.「……そうか すべて 思いだしたぞ。\n 私は すでに 死んだ身なのだな。: Well, I remember everything. I'm already dead.

15947.「わが部下たちは 先に逝ったのか……。\n ならば 私も 逝ってやらねばな。\n:
My men have gone before me... then Steel
Lance, I must go too. That's what I
promised...

15948.「……あの日 わしは オーレンに\n 魔瘴を打ち消す方法を 教えただけで\n 自:
That day, I was satisfied that I'd done my
part by teaching Oren how to counteract the
demon miasma.

15949.「わしが もっと オーレンに協力できれば\n あんな悲劇は 防げたかもしれんのに:
If I had done more to help Oren, that tragedy
could have been prevented, but I didn't do
what I could.

15950.「……これは わしの罪でも あるのじゃ。: This is my sin as well.

15951.「部下たちに グロリスのしずくを与えたことで\n オーレンの無念も 消えたのじゃ:
The Droplet of Gloris that he gave to his men
must have taken Oren's mind off of it. It will
never come back to life.

15952.「あとは この聖杯じゃが……\n お前さん こいつを グレン城の\n チグリ大臣:
Now all that remains is this chalice...and
you...take it back to Minister Chigri at Glen
Castle.

15954.「これで すべて 片付いた。\n ようやく わしも 過去の罪から\n 解放された:
Now everything is cleared up. At last, I feel
that I am free from the sins of the past.

15955.「それでは わしは ひと足先に\n 失礼させてもらうぞ！\n 達者でな <cs_:
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to leave
first! Good luck <cs_pchero>.

15957.「おお ダンデルではないか。\n どうしたと 言うんじゃ？\n そんな やる気を:
Oh, it's Dandel. What's the matter with you?
What's the matter with you? You've got that
look of excitement on your face.

15958.「大臣サマ。ワタクシは 決意したのデス！\n オーレンの身に起こった 悲劇のすべ:
Minister. I have made up my mind! I have
decided that the entire tragedy that befell
Oren must be recorded in a new history book!

15959.「これまで ワタクシは 歴史を学びながらも\n それを どう活かすのか考えていま:
Until now, I had studied history but had not
thought about how to put it to use. Now, for
the first time, I have something I want to do!

15960.「う……うむ。\n やりたいことが できたのなら\n それは すばらしいことじゃ:
Umm...hmm. I think it's wonderful if you can
do what you want to do.

15961.「ありがとうございます 大臣サマっ！\n それでは さっそく 新しい歴史書の\n:
Thank you, Minister! Now, let's get to work on
the new history book!

15962.「……やれやれ。まあ これで \n 正しい歴史が 語られるようになれば\n オー:
Oh well. Well, if this is the way to tell the
correct history, Oren will be saved.

15963.「……エイドスさまも\n きっと 許してくださるでしょう。: I am sure Eidos will forgive you.

16057.「これが お前たちを救ってやれなかった\n 私への罰ならば よろこんで受けよう！:
If this is my punishment for not saving you, I
will gladly accept it!

16058.「だが たとえ このまま死に果てようと\n 決して 私は お前たちを見捨てたりせ:
But even in death, I will never abandon you! I
will be with you in death!
